articles.title: Delhi High Court Dismisses PIL on Unauthorized Construction at Ajmeri Gate
articles.description: Delhi High Court Dismisses PIL on Unauthorized Construction at Ajmeri Gate The Delhi High Court has rejected a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) that accused unauthorized construction in the vicinity of Ajmeri Gate, a protected monument. The decision was based on the court's observation that the petitioners did not demonstrate a genuine interest in the issue and suggested that the PIL was improperly motivated.Filed by Mirza Aurangzeb, allegedly a local resident, the plea raised concerns about violations of the Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites and Remains Act, 1958, and municipal building regulations. Despite claims of several complaints and a Right to Information (RTI) request by the petitioner, the court found these efforts insufficient.Highlighting the importance of obtaining permissions according to Sections 19, 20B, and 20D of the said Act before any construction activity, the plea alleged that the buildings' owners and occupiers were guilty of violating legal provisions and municipal bylaws. However, despite official booking by the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD), no demolition or corrective action has yet been undertaken.

articles.title: ACREX India 2025 Brings Global HVAC Industry Leaders Together
articles.description: ISHRAE (The Indian Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air Conditioning Engineers) in collaboration with Informa Markets in India, proudly announces the 24th edition of ACREX India 2025, South Asia‚Äôs largest exhibition dedicated to air conditioning, heating, ventilation, and intelligent building technologies. Scheduled to take place from 20th to 22nd February 2025 at the Bangalore International Exhibition Centre (BIEC), Bengaluru.ACREX India 2025 is designed for professionals across the HVAC industry, including contractors (HVAC, refrigeration, plumbing, mechanical, building automation and controls), consulting and mechanical engineers, architects, wholesalers, distributors, importers, exporters, public utilities, government agencies, procurement teams, testing and certification bodies, R&D specialists, design-build firms, manufacturers' representatives, and more. The event serves as a key platform for fostering valuable business opportunities and industry collaborations.The three-day expo will host over 500 exhibitors and attract over 30,000 trade visitors. The expo will witness participation from both exhibitors and visitors from over 40 countries, including Belgium, China, the Czech Republic, Egypt, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, Taiwan, the Netherlands, the UAE, the UK, Ukraine, and the USA. Leading industry players, including Fujitsu General India Pvt Ltd, ABS, Daikin, Danfoss, Voltas Bluestar, Johnson Controls, Carrier, Luftek, Saint-Gobain, Edgetech, AAF, SystemAir, Paharpur, Honeywell, Grundfos, ABB, Thermax, Armstromg, Delta Controls and more, will showcase their latest innovations, providing a comprehensive insight into global HVAC trends and advancements.This grand edition in Bengaluru stands as an apex in South Asia‚Äôs HVAC industry. With the theme ‚ÄòUnleashing India‚Äôs Potential for A Responsible Built Environment,‚Äô it serves as a powerhouse of innovation, featuring cutting-edge technologies and sustainable solutions. The growing demand for HVAC solutions is driven by the increasing number of high-rise buildings, Commercial Buildings, Multi use facilities, hypermarkets in Tier-II cities, Data Centres, Super specialty Healthcare facilities and shopping complexes and malls, where HVAC systems are an essential requirement. This growth is further bolstered by the government‚Äôs continued emphasis on ongoing smart city projects across the nation, creating new avenues for infrastructure development and technological advancements in the HVACR sector.The show is amply supported by both domestic and international associations such as the Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Trades Association (RATA), All India Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Association (ACRA), American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers (ASHRAE), International Institute of Ammonia Refrigeration (IIAR), Assocham India, Indian Plumbing Association, India Green Building Council (IGBC), FSAI, UN Environment Programme, International Copper Association India, Contamination Control Society of India (CCSI), Federation of European Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning Associations (REHVA), IIFIIR, ISKID, Green Business Certification Institute (GBCI), among others.Mr. Anoop Ballaney, Society President, ISHRAE said "The HVAC industry is advancing rapidly, driven by breakthrough innovations in energy efficiency, smart automation, and sustainable climate control solutions. At ISHRAE, we remain at the forefront of shaping industry standards, pioneering research, and fostering technical excellence in HVACR systems. ACREX India 2025 will be a crucial platform for industry professionals, engineers, and researchers to exchange insights on cutting-edge HVAC technologies, from advanced refrigerants and decarbonization strategies to AI-driven building automation and net-zero cooling solutions. Through our commitment to technical standardization and skill development, ISHRAE continues to play a pivotal role in guiding the industry towards global best practices and regulatory compliance. As India‚Äôs demand for climate-responsive infrastructure grows, it is imperative to drive the adoption of intelligent, high-performance HVAC solutions that prioritize efficiency, resilience, and sustainability. ACREX India will not only showcase the latest technological advancements but also reinforce the importance of technical collaboration in setting new benchmarks for the industry." Speaking on the announcement of ACREX India, Mr. Yogesh Mudras, Managing Director, Informa Markets in India said, ‚ÄúThe demand for HVAC systems in India is witnessing a steady rise, driven by rapid urbanisation, expanding infrastructure, and an increasing emphasis on energy efficiency and indoor air quality. Government initiatives such as the Energy Conservation and Sustainable Building Code (ECSBC), 'Make in India,' and Production Linked Incentive (PLI) schemes are accelerating the adoption of energy-efficient and smart HVAC technologies, aligning with India's vision for carbon neutrality by 2070. As South Asia‚Äôs premier event for the HVAC industry, ACREX India 2025 will serve as a channel for innovation, collaboration, and knowledge exchange. With a focus on sustainable and intelligent building solutions, the event will bring together global leaders, policymakers, and industry professionals to drive the future of HVAC technology and position India as a key player in the global HVAC landscape."Celebrating Industry ExcellenceAttendees at ACREX India 2025 can look forward to an exciting lineup of events celebrating excellence, innovation, and industry advancements. The prestigious ACREX Awards of Excellence will honor outstanding contributions and groundbreaking products in the HVAC sector. Adding to the prestige, the ACREX Hall of Fame will recognise industry icons whose visionary contributions continue to inspire building developers, architects, and designers. The expo will also feature dynamic zones such as the Startup Pavilion, Innovation Zone, and Demo Zone, providing a platform for emerging technologies and hands-on experiences. B2B Meetings and the Solution Center will facilitate valuable industry collaborations, while Technical Seminars & Workshops (delivered by distinguished speakers from across the globe), the Launch Pad, and Idea Presentations will showcase the latest trends, insights, and transformative solutions shaping the future of HVACR.HVAC Industry in IndiaIndia's HVAC industry is experiencing rapid growth, driven by increasing demand across sectors such as industrial facilities, healthcare, retail, and data centers. The adoption of energy-efficient solutions like inverter HVAC systems and smart controls is gaining momentum, reducing energy consumption and operational costs. Innovations such as variable refrigerant flow (VRF) systems and IoT-enabled smart HVAC solutions are enhancing efficiency and indoor air quality. Additionally, sustainability initiatives and green building certifications like LEED, IGBC and GRIHA are accelerating the shift toward environmentally friendly HVAC systems, positioning the industry for long-term expansion.Also Read: ACREX India 2024: HVAC Expo Accelerates Industry Growth

articles.description: In a major disruption for passengers traveling to Prayagraj, the Indian Railways has canceled multiple trains originating from Bihar and Chhattisgarh until February 23. Among them, the Durg-Chhapra Sarnath Express (Train No. 15159/15160) will remain suspended from February 19 to February 21. This train, which passes through Prayagraj, is a crucial route for passengers heading to the city. The cancellation has caused inconvenience to many travelers.

articles.title: Adani Bribery Case: SEC's Pursuit for Justice Continues
articles.description: Adani Bribery Case: SEC's Pursuit for Justice Continues The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is intensifying its efforts to serve a complaint on Gautam and Sagar Adani, alleged participants in a significant bribery scheme. The complaint, part of broader lawsuits, involves accusations that they violated antifraud provisions by making misleading representations concerning Adani Green Energy Ltd.The SEC's actions are being conducted in collaboration with Indian authorities under the Hague Service Convention to ensure proper service of the complaint. The Commission submitted an update on these efforts to Judge Nicholas Garaufis in the Eastern District of New York, emphasizing that Gautam and Sagar Adani are currently located in India.The Adani Group has countered these allegations, terming them baseless, and remains adamant about the group‚Äôs commitment to adhere to legal and regulatory standards across all its operations. This legal saga also includes charges from the US Department of Justice and highlights a broader scrutiny of governance within the Adani conglomerate.

articles.title: Bolsonaro Faces Charges in Alleged Coup Plot
articles.description: Bolsonaro Faces Charges in Alleged Coup Plot Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro was formally charged on Tuesday for allegedly plotting a coup to overturn his 2022 electoral defeat. These charges add another layer of complexity to the troubled far-right leader's dwindling dreams of a political resurgence.Prosecutor General Paulo Gonet has indicted Bolsonaro along with his former running mate, General Walter Braga Netto, accusing them of spearheading a 'criminal organization' aimed at dismantling Brazil's 40-year-old democracy.In total, 34 individuals including high-ranking military officials have been implicated, highlighting a broader conspiracy. The charges follow a two-year investigation into Bolsonaro's role in inciting violent protests in January 2023, just days after President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's inauguration.

articles.title: Trump's Bold Move: Tariffs Set to Reshape Global Trade
articles.description: Trump's Bold Move: Tariffs Set to Reshape Global Trade President Donald Trump has announced a series of 25% tariffs on automobile, pharmaceutical, and semiconductor imports, threatening to disrupt international trade relations. His announcement, part of a wider strategy to recalibrate global commerce, has sparked concerns about retaliatory measures.Trump has long criticized what he perceives as the unfair trade treatment of U.S. automotive exports. For example, the European Union imposes a 10% duty on imported vehicles, contrasting sharply with the U.S. passenger car tariff rate of 2.5%. However, a significantly higher 25% tariff is already levied on pickup trucks from countries outside of NAFTA partners.EU officials, led by Trade Chief Maros Sefcovic, are set to hold discussions with U.S. counterparts in Washington. EU lawmakers deny any changes in tariffs on U.S. cars. Meanwhile, Trump expects significant investments in the U.S. from major companies as part of this tariff strategy. With additional tariffs on steel, aluminum, and a range of downstream products, Trump's trade policy remains a pivotal element of his administration.

articles.title: Electrochaea Partners with Hitachi to Bring Synthetic Methane to Japan
articles.description: MUNICH and TOKYO, Feb. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Electrochaea and Hitachi have signed a five-year technology transfer and licensing agreement. Hitachi will deploy Electrochaea's patented technology to produce clean, synthetic methane at the first biomethanation plant in Japan, with commissioning targeted in 2027. Electrochaea's commercial-scale power-to-methane technology will help to significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions and deliver a cost-effective, drop-in replacement for fossil fuel-based natural gas in Japan. Under the licensing agreement, Hitachi will retain the option to purchase additional licenses to deploy Electrochaea's biomethanation technology throughout Japan. The deployment of Electrochaea ÃÅs technology in Japan will support the country's climate goals to achieve 5% carbon-neutralized gas via the injection of 1% synthetic methane into existing infrastructure by 2030, increasing to 90% carbon-neutralized gas by 2050. In turn, this supports the country's climate pledge to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 46% by 2030 compared to 2013 levels and achieve carbon neutrality by 2050. "We are delighted Hitachi has chosen Electrochaea's proprietary P2M technology to bring biomethanation to Japan. Partnering with a global energy leader strengthens our presence worldwide and will be key to our expansion throughout Asia. e-Methane can play an important role in realizing Japan's ambitious climate goals and we're proud that Electrochaea's innovative technology has been validated by esteemed industry leaders." - Dr. Doris Hafenbradl, CTO and Managing Director, Electrochaea. About Electrochaea: Electrochaea is a leading Power-to-Gas technology provider and provides patented IP to generate renewable synthetic methane. The company's proprietary biomethanation process utilizes excess green power and emitted CO2 to produce a renewable fuel that can be stored and transported via existing gas grids and infrastructure, and has been demonstrated at plants in Germany, Switzerland and the United States. Dedicated to combating climate change, Electrochaea's innovative technology facilitates the long-term storage and transportation of green energy and provides a safe, drop-in alternative to fossil fuel-derived natural gas. Electrochaea's HQ is located in Munich, Germany, with offices in Denmark and the United States. Visit us at www.electrochaea.com - Picture is available at AP - Press Contact: Maria Beschid, Communications Manager, +491726507339, maria.beschid@electrochaea.com

articles.title: Russian Air Defenses Foil Ukrainian Drone Attack
articles.description: Russian Air Defenses Foil Ukrainian Drone Attack In a swift military response, Russian air defences successfully intercepted 21 Ukrainian drones late Tuesday night, the Russian Defence Ministry reported. The majority of these unmanned aerial vehicles were taken down over the western Bryansk region.The Ministry disclosed on Telegram that the air defence units operated between 9:30 p.m. and 10:30 p.m., effectively neutralizing 20 drones targeting the Bryansk region along the Ukrainian border.Additionally, one drone was reported downed over Crimea, which has been under Russian control since its annexation in 2014, following a popular uprising in Ukraine that led to the flight of a pro-Russian president.

articles.title: U.S.-Russia Talks: Controversial Moves and Global Reactions
articles.description: U.S.-Russia Talks: Controversial Moves and Global Reactions President Trump's administration is breaking diplomatic ground by agreeing to further talks with Russia on ending the ongoing conflict in Ukraine, following a lengthy discussion in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. This marks a shift from the previous U.S. policy of rallying allies to isolate Russia, a decision that has stirred controversy among European leaders.U.S. and Russian officials have met to discuss halting the deadliest European conflict since World War II. However, Ukraine and several European politicians have expressed concerns about the perceived concessions offered to Moscow, as the new U.S. stance rules out NATO membership for Ukraine. Meanwhile, U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio believes a peace process will require significant concessions from all involved.This diplomatic development has raised alarms in Ukraine and among U.S. allies, who fear a potential power shift favoring Moscow. Following the talks, there are no plans for a Trump-Putin meeting, and Ukrainian President Zelenskiy postponed a scheduled visit to Saudi Arabia. Observers await further developments amid tensions and skepticism over any progress.

articles.title: Trump Expands IVF Access with Executive Order
articles.description: Trump Expands IVF Access with Executive Order U.S. President Donald Trump has taken a significant step by signing an executive order to enhance access to in vitro fertilization (IVF), White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt announced on Tuesday.The order includes directives to develop policy recommendations that will protect access to IVF treatments. It further aims to address the financial burden of these treatments by reducing out-of-pocket expenses and health plan costs associated with IVF.Leavitt posted on X that this initiative seeks to make IVF more affordable and accessible to individuals, intending to support those facing challenges in starting or expanding families.

articles.title: Gagandeep Kumar of Kathua, who won a Bronze Medal in the 38th National Games held in Dehradun, Uttarakhand, is warmly welcomed by family, friends and local youth upon his return to Kathua. He earned the bronze in the Net Ball event, showcasing his exceptional talent. Gagandeep was later honoured by MLA Kathua, Dr. Bharat Bhushan, for his outstanding achievement at the national level. A proud member of the Kathua Athletic Club, he credited his success to coaches Ravi Jassal and Akash Batra. Gagandeep also acknowledged the unwavering support of his father, Sudesh Kumar, a soldier in Assam Rifles.

articles.title: I Would Go With Arshdeep Singh Over Harshit Rana, Says Ricky Ponting
creator: PTI
articles.description: Australian great Ricky Ponting will pick Arshdeep Singh over Harshit Rana for India's Champions Trophy opener against Bangladesh here on Thursday with the Rohit Sharma-led side hoping to fill the huge void left by injured pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah.Rana has done alright in the chances he has got ahead of the ICC event but Ponting feels the left-arm pacer Arshdeep is better suited to bowl in all phases of the 50-over game."I would go with the left-armer and I'd go with Arshdeep (to replace Bumrah)," Ponting said on The ICC Review."We know how good he's been in T20 cricket and if you think about the skill set, he probably provides a similar skill set to what Bumrah does with new ball and death overs and that's what India will miss."That's taking nothing away from Harshit Rana because I think he has got a lot of talent and we know what he can do with the new ball, but I don't think his death skills are as good as what Arshdeep Singh‚Äôs are."The former Australian captain feels the presence of a left-arm fast bowler in the playing eleven is always "crucial"."And just that left-arm variation, someone that can bowl left-arm with a new ball and move the new ball. We know how important they are and crucial they can be, especially in big tournaments when you've got a lot of right-handers at the top. I would personally lean that way if I was India." Ponting added that the likes of Rohit and Virat Kohli getting back amongst in the preceding ODI series against England augurs well for India.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs great to see Shreyas Iyer back in the team and playing well in the middle order. He was great," he said.‚ÄúMore importantly for India, (Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli) were back scoring runs and that's what they need going into big tournaments."Rohit, Virat, your experienced players, you need them to stand up in the big tournaments in the big moments. So, everything for India right now, with the exception of the loss of Bumrah, everything else looks in good order.‚Äù(This story is published as part of the auto-generated syndicate wire feed. No editing has been done in the headline or the body by ABP Live.)

articles.title: Market Anticipates Fed Minutes Amid Trade Uncertainty
articles.description: Market Anticipates Fed Minutes Amid Trade Uncertainty In a subdued session on Wall Street, investors focused on upcoming Federal Reserve meeting minutes and evolving U.S. trade policies. The Fed had maintained interest rates in January, heightening interest in its future moves following recent economic data uncertainty.Fed officials have expressed varied views on trade tariffs and interest rate stability. The speculation of at least one rate cut by December adds to the market's anticipation. Meanwhile, geopolitical events, such as potential peace talks between Russia and Ukraine, contributed to the overall market sentiment.Key gains on Tuesday included Intel's 9.5% rise following potential breakup deals and Constellation Brands' 5% increase after Berkshire Hathaway's investment disclosure. Despite these gains, the market remained watchful, with major indexes showing mixed responses.

articles.title: Political Storm: Allegations and Inquiry Surrounding Minister Sanjay Nishad
articles.description: Political Storm: Allegations and Inquiry Surrounding Minister Sanjay Nishad The Uttar Pradesh Congress has urged Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath to initiate a judicial inquiry into allegations against state minister Sanjay Nishad regarding the alleged suicide of Congress leader Dharmatma Nishad.In a letter penned by state Congress president Ajay Rai, it was stated that Dharmatma Nishad, a state secretary in the Nishad Party, reportedly ended his life after accusing Sanjay Nishad on social media. The Congress insists on the minister's resignation, arguing he lacks the moral standing to occupy his position during the investigation.Dharmatma Nishad's suicide, occurring in Maharajganj district, has sparked calls for one crore rupees in compensation and a government job for the victim‚Äôs family. Rai emphasized an unbiased probe and urged the chief minister to take immediate action, while Sanjay Nishad seeks an impartial investigation to clear his name.

articles.title: Tense Withdrawal: Lebanon's Path to Recovery Amid Conflict and Ceasefire Hopes
articles.description: Tense Withdrawal: Lebanon's Path to Recovery Amid Conflict and Ceasefire Hopes Residents of south Lebanon have begun returning to their villages as Israeli forces commence a withdrawal following last year's conflict with Hezbollah. The war left millions displaced and significant destruction in its wake.During a visit to the ravaged village of Kfar Kila, many residents, like Noha Hammoud, found homes reduced to rubble. Meanwhile, search and rescue teams have recovered both deceased and surviving individuals, predominantly Hezbollah fighters.Despite progress, Hezbollah claims Israel's continued presence signifies ongoing occupation, urging Lebanon to take action. A U.S.-brokered ceasefire mandates Israel's retreat; however, disputes over compliance delay full withdrawal.

articles.title: LIC Unveils Cutting-Edge Pension Plan with Multiple Annuity Options
articles.description: LIC Unveils Cutting-Edge Pension Plan with Multiple Annuity Options The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) has introduced an innovative single-premium smart pension plan, catering to both single and joint life annuitants with a range of annuity options.The launch event, graced by Financial Services Secretary M Nagaraju and LIC CEO & MD Siddhartha Mohanty, highlighted the plan's flexible liquidity options, including partial and full withdrawals.With a minimum purchase price of Rs 1,00,000, the plan offers incentives for higher investment and allows annuity payments on a yearly, half-yearly, quarterly, or monthly basis, with special provisions for NPS subscribers.

articles.title: Zelenskyy Reschedules Saudi Trip Amid US-Russia Talks Tension
articles.description: Zelenskyy Reschedules Saudi Trip Amid US-Russia Talks Tension Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has delayed his planned visit to Saudi Arabia, initially scheduled for this week. The decision follows Ukraine's exclusion from upcoming US-Russia discussions aimed at ending the war, set to take place in the kingdom.Zelenskyy indicated that his intention was to prevent his visit from coinciding with the negotiations, thereby avoiding any implications of Ukraine's involvement or endorsement. This decision aligns with the President's strategic approach to highlight Ukraine's sovereignty amidst international diplomacy efforts.The Ukrainian leader has now set March 10 as the new date for his visit, distancing his diplomatic engagement from the controversial talks.

articles.description: The National Financial Reporting Authority identified shortcomings in audits by Price Waterhouse Chartered Accountants LLP and Price Waterhouse & Co Chartered Accountants LLP during quality inspections. Key concerns involved internal financial controls, related party transactions, and asset impairment. The independence policy issues from previous reports remain unaddressed, raising doubts about audit quality and reliability.

articles.title: Smriti Irani: Caught in the Crossfire of Alleged Funding Controversy
articles.description: Smriti Irani: Caught in the Crossfire of Alleged Funding Controversy The Congress party has recently accused BJP leader Smriti Irani of acting as an agent for billionaire investor George Soros. The allegations arose from a controversy over funding by a US agency aimed at boosting voter turnout in India.Congress leveraged Irani's past as a USAID 'Goodwill Ambassador' to criticize her connection, claiming it implies her association with Soros. BJP, however, defended Irani, highlighting her appointment as WHO's Oral Rehydration Salts Goodwill Brand Ambassador from 2002 to 2005.The dispute escalated into a war of words with Congress highlighting BJP's ties with external agencies, questioning financial motives, and prompting a defense based on Irani's past endorsements. Soros' alleged anti-India stance forms a backdrop to these claims.

articles.title: Akshay Kumar steps into divine mode with the latest track ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô
articles.description: On Tuesday, Akshay Kumar unveiled a special devotional track, ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô which is expected to be the actor‚Äôs powerful tribute to Lord Shiva, ahead of Maha Shivratri on February 26. The actor insisted on retaining the raw and authentic elements of the song, while keeping it deeply devotional. Furthermore, the track blends traditional sounds with energetic beats, as it aims at resonating with listeners across generations, including Gen-Z.Kicking off the celebrations of Maha Shivrati almost a week before, ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô is the perfect anthem to rejoice the occasion. With strong visuals, the song promises to transport listeners to a realm of devotion, encouraging them to connect with and embrace their spirituality. We hear that the powerful and engaging visuals in the video is to enhance the song‚Äôs impact, so that the audience get a captivating experience. The lyrics is penned by Shekhar Astitwa along with music composed by Vikram Montrose. We hear that the duo was keen on creating an uplifting experience for everyone. Meanwhile, Akshay Kumar‚Äôs look in ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô was expected to be unique and different from his avatar in films as they wanted to create it in a way where he immerses himself into Mahadev‚Äôs energy to radiate strength and devotion. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar)It is a known fact that Akshay Kumar has often opened up about his devotion to Lord Shiva and he has even created tracks for the Almighty in the past. If you may recall, in 2024, he came out with ‚ÄòShambhu‚Äô, a devotional track dedicated to Mahadev. Now, with ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô, the actor once again presents a grand fusion of music and visuals, as he expresses his unwavering devotion to Mahadev, yet again. On February 18, the track was released across musical platforms.On the film front, Akshay Kumar is currently gearing up for the release of Kesari Chapter 2, which is based on the historical events of Jallianwala Bagh Massacre, as it revolves around the life of Indian lawyer and statesman C Sankaran Nair. Also starring Ananya Panday, R Madhavan, and others, the film is slated to release in the first half of 2025.Also Read: Palash Sen pens open letter of appreciation to Akshay Kumar as duo join forces for ‚ÄòMahakal Chalo‚Äô song: ‚ÄúYou were giving me support and a backing no one from Bollywood has‚Äù

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra applauds Anuja for Oscar nomination: ‚ÄúI Highly recommend you to watch this remarkable film‚Äù
articles.description: Anuja, the American Hindi-language short film, has been making waves since it began streaming on Netflix on February 5, 2025. The film has captured the hearts of audiences from diverse backgrounds and has even secured a nomination for the upcoming Oscar Awards. Priyanka Chopra has praised the film, calling her production venture on Netflix "highly recommended.‚ÄùOn February 18, 2025, Priyanka Chopra took to her Instagram Story to share her enthusiasm for Anuja. She posted the movie's poster and expressed her excitement about its Oscar nomination and wrote, ‚Äú@anujathefilm is in the race for the Oscars! I highly recommend you to watch this remarkable film on Netflix.‚ÄùEarlier this month, Priyanka Chopra Jonas shared her excitement over Anuja's nomination for an Academy Award in the Best Live Action Short Film category. Taking to social media, the Bajirao Mastani actress posted a brief clip from the film and wrote, ‚ÄúI know you'll be just as moved by Anuja as I was... and I'm beyond thrilled to share that it's coming to Netflix on Feb 5!‚ÄùIn her post, Priyanka Chopra Jonas also highlighted the performances of the two lead actors, Sajda Pathan and Ananya Shanbhag, describing their work as "powerful" and praising the emotional depth they brought to the film.Directed and written by Adam J. Graves, Anuja tells the story of a gifted 9-year-old girl and her older sister as they navigate the challenges of poverty. The film premiered on August 17, 2024, at the HollyShorts Film Festival and is produced by Guneet Monga, Mindy Kaling, Suchitra Mattai, and others. Later, Priyanka Chopra Jonas joined the team as an executive producer through her production company, Purple Pebble Pictures.Also Read : Priyanka Chopra shares priceless throwback snaps featuring childhood photos, BTS of shelved film with Ajay Devgn and Dilip Kumar, and more!

articles.title: Bhool Chuk Maaf Teaser: Rajkummar Rao And Wamiqa Gabbi Starrer Promises A Wholesome Mix Of Romance And Comedy
creator: ABP News Bureau
articles.description: Bhool Chuk Maaf Teaser: The teaser of Bhool Chuk Maaf, an upcoming Bollywood romantic comedy starring Rajkummar Rao and Wamiqa Gabbi, was unveiled on Tuesday. Directed and written by Karan Sharma, the film is set in the heart of Varanasi and captures the charm of small-town romance with a humorous yet emotional narrative.About the filmThe story follows Ranjan, a hopeless romantic who lands a government job to fulfill his dream of marrying the love of his life, Titli. However, just before the wedding, a series of unexpected events unfold, turning his world upside down. What follows is a hilarious yet heartfelt journey of love, fate, and redemption. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Maddock Films (@maddockfilms)Produced by Maddock Films, led by Dinesh Vijan, the film is presented in collaboration with Amazon MGM Studios. Maddock Films has consistently delivered blockbuster hits like Stree, Munjya, Stree 2, Bhediya, Luka Chuppi, and Zara Hatke Zara Bachke, with Stree 2 currently holding the record for the highest-grossing Hindi film.Maddock Films is known for bringing fresh and engaging stories to the screen, and Bhool Chuk Maaf is no exception. The film promises to be a laugh riot that will also leave you with warmth in your heart. With Bhool Chuk Maaf, the production house promises another engaging and entertaining cinematic experience. The film is set to hit theaters on April 10, 2025.Rajkummar Rao and Wamiqa's work frontMeanwhile, Rajkummar Rao is basking in the success of his recent hits, including Stree 2 and Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video, where he starred alongside Triptii Dimri. On the other hand, Wamiqa Gabbi was last seen in the Varun Dhawan starrer action drama 'Baby John.' Known for her impactful performances in Jubilee and Khufiya, Wamiqa is among one of the most promising actresses of Bollywood.ALSO READ: When Best Friends Rani Mukerji And Aishwarya Rai Had A Fallout Due To Shah Rukh Khan, Watch

articles.title: Indian Women's Hockey Team Gears Up for Crucial Clash Against Spain
articles.description: Indian Women's Hockey Team Gears Up for Crucial Clash Against Spain As the Indian Women's Hockey Team preps for a critical double-header against Spain, they aim to return to winning form on February 18 and 19 at the Kalinga Hockey Stadium in Bhubaneswar. Despite a promising start with a 3-2 victory over England, the team's recent 2-1 shootout loss in their second match has left them eager for redemption.Currently ranked eighth, the squad led by Salima Tete hopes to refine their set-piece execution and strengthen defensive strategies. Meanwhile, Vice Captain Navneet Kaur's consistent performance and penalty corner tactics remain crucial to their upcoming matches. Speaking to the media, Captain Tete emphasized the importance of sharpening focus on penalty corners and defensive coordination to boost their standing.Spain is entering the competition with motivation from two consecutive 2-1 victories against Germany, landing them in fourth place. Despite mixed results earlier in the league, they aim to capitalize on recent successes. The Indian team's upcoming fixtures are pivotal for gaining momentum throughout the tournament, aiming for a better position in the rankings.

articles.title: Tensions Escalate in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Amid Terror Attacks
articles.description: Tensions Escalate in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Amid Terror Attacks A terrorist was killed and a policeman was injured in a hand grenade attack on a mobile police unit in Pakistan's Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, according to reports on Tuesday.The incident, reported by Geo News, occurred in the Shadipur area of Kohat district, where a retaliatory exchange of fire resulted in the arrest of several militants and recovery of weapons.The assault underscores a surge in terror attacks in Pakistan, with authorities increasingly holding the Afghan government accountable for failing to curb Tehreek-e-Taliban Pakistan's militancy, as highlighted by the strained relations between Islamabad and Kabul.

articles.title: 'Something Dirty In Ranveer Allahbadia's Mind': SC On YouTuber's 'Sex With Parents' Remark
creator: Nipun Sehgal
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Tuesday slammed YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia saying his mind was filled with filth over his 'sex with parents' remark at Samay Raina's 'India's Got Latent' comedy show. "If this is not obscenity, what is it? Why should we quash or club FIRs against you," the SC said. However, the court said no FIR shall be registered against the petitioner on the basis of the India's Got Latent show, which was the cause of the initial FIRs"The petitioner [Ranveer] shall be at Liberty to approach local police of Maharashtra and Assam for protection of life and liberty in case of any threat impeding him in joining the probe. If any other FIR is registered in Jaipur the arrest shall remain stayed in that FIR as well," the court said.Ranveer Allahbadia shall deposit his passport with the Thane police and cannot leave the country without permission of the Supreme Court.

articles.title: Russia Seeks U.S. Understanding in Ukraine Talks
articles.description: Russia Seeks U.S. Understanding in Ukraine Talks Russia is optimistic that the United States will grasp Moscow‚Äôs stance in the ongoing negotiations over Ukraine, according to a report by Interfax news agency. This sentiment was expressed by Kirill Dmitriev, the head of Russia's sovereign wealth fund, on Tuesday.Dmitriev, who received his education in the U.S. and is a former Goldman Sachs banker, has been an influential figure in past communications between Moscow and Washington.His influential role was particularly notable during Donald Trump's initial presidential term from 2016 to 2020, where he contributed significantly to the dialogue between the two nations.

articles.title: Samajwadi Party Stages Protest Ahead of Uttar Pradesh Assembly Budget Session
articles.description: Samajwadi Party Stages Protest Ahead of Uttar Pradesh Assembly Budget Session In a significant political move, Samajwadi Party members staged a protest ahead of the Uttar Pradesh Assembly's Budget session. The demonstration was fueled by grievances over multiple issues, prominently featuring the controversial Kumbh stampede incident.Highly concerned, Senior SP MLA Amitabh Trivedi accused the government of providing fabricated data on the Kumbh Mela tragedy's death toll and urged for comprehensive discussions in the legislative House.On the session's commencement, Speaker Satish Mahana announced a multilingual platform enabling MLAs to communicate in regional dialects like Awadhi, Bhojpuri, Bundeli, and Braj, enhancing local representation in debates and discussions.

articles.title: John Abraham Launches Aprilia Tuono 457 At Rs 3.95 Lakh
creator: Somnath Chatterjee
articles.description: Bollywood Actor and bike lover, John Abraham has launched the Aprilia Tuono 457 at Rs 3.95 lakh. This is the more affordable bike and is the naked version of the RS 457 which is upwards of Rs 4 lakh at Rs 4.2 lakh.It has a different styling when compared to the fully faired sibling and has a sharp look which is seen with naked motorcycles. The engine is the same 457cc powertrain which develops 47.6 bhp and 43.5 Nm. It has a 6-speed gearbox and a slip assisted clutch along with a quick shifter.Much of the RS 457 is shared with the Tuono and that includes the 5inch TFt display plus Bluetooth along with ABS and traction control.Also Read : Aprilia RS 457 Vs Tuono 457: Which One Suits You?Even the riding position is different from the fully faired version while the naked bike is expected to be having a handlebar placed higher than the clip on setup on the RS457. Braking is taken care of by disc brakes at the front and rear while it has a preload adjustable USD fork and a monoshock.Compared to the fully faired version, the Tuono shows its engine off further and the riding dynamics while being the same would be slightly less extreme. Aprilia has priced it less than the RS 457 while helping it to compete with rivals like the BMW G310R, KTM Duke 390 others.Also Read : BYD Sealion 7 India Review: Most Value Packed Luxury EV?

articles.title: Tesla begins hiring spree in India after Elon Musk-PM Modi meeting
articles.description: Tesla Inc., a global leader in renewable energy and electric vehicles, which has had a limited presence in India, announced plans on Monday to begin hiring in the country. According to job listings recently posted on its LinkedIn profile, the firm is seeking to fill 13 positions, including both back-end and customer-facing roles. This action comes after Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla, met with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi when he was in the US. At least five of the positions, including service technician and various advisory roles, were available in both Mumbai and Delhi, while the rest of the openings, such as customer engagement manager and delivery operations specialist, were for Mumbai. Also Read | Tata Motors to install 400,000 EV charging stations across India by 2027 Over the years, Tesla's interactions with India have been irregular, mostly because of worries about exorbitant import taxes. Nonetheless, India recently lowered the minimum customs duty from 110% to 70% on luxury vehicles costing more than $40,000. India is becoming a more alluring market for electric cars as a result of this shift and its efforts to decarbonize its economy and reach net-zero emissions by 2070. Despite being the third-largest emitter of greenhouse gases in the world, India is a crucial market for Tesla's EVs due to its expanding middle class and need for sustainable solutions. In order to make significant investments in India, Tesla has long sought to reduce import levies. While India‚Äôs EV sales neared 100,000 units last year, this number is small compared to China, where 11 million EVs were sold in the same period. However, with the Indian government pushing for cleaner energy solutions and offering incentives for EV adoption, Tesla sees potential in the market. Also Read | Mahindra strikes GOLD again! BE 6 and XUV 9e bookings cross Rs 8,472 crore Musk had intended to travel to India in 2022 to meet with Prime Minister Modi, which sparked rumors about Tesla's potential manufacturing plant and other future investments in the nation. To address pressing business concerns, like as employee layoffs and American auto recalls, Musk, however, postponed the trip.

articles.title: Turmoil in New York City: Mayor Adams Faces Unprecedented Scrutiny
articles.description: Turmoil in New York City: Mayor Adams Faces Unprecedented Scrutiny New York City's political landscape is in upheaval as Governor Kathy Hochul contemplates removing Mayor Eric Adams from office following the resignation of four top deputies involved in the ongoing corruption case. The Justice Department's decision to terminate this case has intensified scrutiny on Adams, who is grappling with political opposition and calls for resignation from leading Democrats.Amid this turmoil, First Deputy Mayor Maria Torres-Springer, Deputy Mayor for Operations Meera Joshi, Health and Human Services Deputy Mayor Anne Williams-Isom, and Public Safety Deputy Mayor Chauncey Parker have all announced their departures. Adams, under pressure to maintain leadership, acknowledges the challenges and pledges that New York City will persevere through these trying times.Federal prosecutors are deliberating over the dismissal of corruption charges linked to Adams' tenure as Brooklyn borough president. The Justice Department's precarious alliance with Adams stems from demands for his cooperation with President Donald Trump's immigration strategies, further complicating the city's political dynamics.

articles.title: Social Security Shakeup: Michelle King's Departure Amid Government Record Dispute
articles.description: Social Security Shakeup: Michelle King's Departure Amid Government Record Dispute Michelle King, previously the acting commissioner of the Social Security Administration, has stepped down from her position after a weekend of contention over sensitive government documents. Sources familiar with the matter revealed the disagreement centered on efforts by Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency to obtain these records.The Washington Post reported the incident on Sunday, underscoring a growing rift between government departments as transparency and data access become increasingly contentious issues.King's resignation marks a significant moment in the ongoing debate over data privacy and governmental authority, as departments wrestle with balancing efficiency against safeguarding sensitive information.

articles.title: Nationwide Protests Challenge Trump's Policies on Presidents Day
articles.description: Nationwide Protests Challenge Trump's Policies on Presidents Day In a bold display of dissent, thousands of protesters took to the streets across the United States on Presidents Day, braving freezing temperatures to voice their disapproval of President Donald Trump's policies. The rallies, bearing the slogan 'No kings on Presidents Day,' spread across East Coast cities and reached the Arizona Statehouse.Florida and California witnessed significant gatherings under the 'Not my Presidents Day' theme, driven by the 50501 Movement. This marks the second widespread protest within two weeks, pointing to growing discontent towards Trump's administration and Elon Musk, who leads the new Department of Government Efficiency aimed at federal budget cuts.In Boston, despite the biting cold, nearly 1,000 demonstrators marched from the Statehouse to City Hall, while similar protests erupted across key cities. The movements targeted what they labeled the Trump administration's 'anti-democratic actions' and advocated for preserving foundational American values amid new federal policies.

articles.title: Former Argentine President Faces Charges of Gender Violence
articles.description: Former Argentine President Faces Charges of Gender Violence In a dramatic legal development, a federal judge has determined that former Argentine President Alberto Fernandez must face formal charges relating to allegations of gender violence against former first lady Fabiola Yanez. The ruling came after Judge Julian Ercolini reviewed evidence suggesting Fernandez committed acts of physical abuse against Yanez, including neck grabs and slaps, during and beyond his term as president.The accusations, which Fernandez denies, could potentially lead to a prison sentence of up to 18 years if he is found guilty. The judge's decision followed a prosecutor's formal investigation that began after Yanez filed a complaint in August 2024. Fernandez has legal avenues left to pursue, including an appeal process that might delay further proceedings for years.Key pieces of evidence presented in the case include WhatsApp exchanges that Yanez provided, showing photographic evidence of her injuries, along with comprehensive testimonies from her family and friends. The judge highlighted the long-term psychological and physical impact on Yanez, citing eight years of alleged abuse and its enduring effects on her wellbeing.

articles.description: Tragedy Averted: All Safe After Delta Plane Incident in Toronto Emergency and police teams swiftly responded after a Delta Airlines plane arriving from Minneapolis experienced an incident at Toronto Pearson International Airport on Monday, as reported by CTV News.Pearson Airport confirmed that all passengers and crew members on the flight were safe and accounted for, issuing a statement on the social media platform X.Efforts to reach Delta Airlines for further comment have not yet been successful as they have not issued a public response regarding the incident.
